verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He's the Lily of the Valley, the Bright and Morning Star, He's the greatest of ten thousand to my soul.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have found a friend in Jesus- He's ev'rything to me, He's the fairest of ten thousand to my soul; The Lily of the Valley- in Him alone I see All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole. In sorrow He's my comfort, in trouble He's my stay, He tells me ev'ry care on Him to roll;{/lang-eng}
